thread.section_title: British Journal of Sports Medicine current issue
thread.title: StandApp: stand up, stay healthy!

author: Weiler, R.
title: StandApp: stand up, stay healthy!
text: Health Platform Apple (iOS 6.0 or later); also available for mass business purchase (price varies depending on user numbers) on desktop with Windows XP, 7, 8. Cost Free; StandApp Pro available for £0.79 without advertisements. About the app The initial welcome pages run through a simple brief education summary explaining key health benefits of standing compared to sitting. StandApp enables the user to set alarm reminders or regular interval alarms to interrupt time spent sitting down, with reminders to stand. There are video demonstrations of about 30 examples of simple desk-based stretches and exercises, which can be followed during 5 min standing breaks, as seen in figure 1. …
